items.content_html: MiniBlock 2D is a lightweight, 2D game. The goal of this project is to improve JavaScript skills while offering a fun, interactive experience for players. Whether you’re a gamer exploring blocky worlds or a developer honing your skills, MiniBlock 2D has something for you!
items.title: homayunmmdy/MiniBlock: MiniBlock 2D is a lightweight, 2D game. The goal of this project is to improve JavaScript skills while offering a fun, interactive experience for players. Whether you’re a gamer exploring blocky worlds or a developer honing your skills, MiniBlock 2D has something for you!

items.content_html: qkie is a simple and lightweight JavaScript package for managing cookies in the browser.
items.title: conedevelopment/qkie: qkie is a simple and lightweight JavaScript package for managing cookies in the browser.

items.content_html: A sleek and minimalist music player built using HTML and CSS. This project showcases a simple yet elegant design for playing your favorite tunes, offering a clean and responsive user interface. Perfect for beginners exploring web design or anyone looking for a lightweight music player template!
items.title: omrmhd5/Mini-Music-Player: A sleek and minimalist music player built using HTML and CSS. This project showcases a simple yet elegant design for playing your favorite tunes, offering a clean and responsive user interface. Perfect for beginners exploring web design or anyone looking for a lightweight music player template!

items.content_html: Very lightweight reminder app using React + Tauri, with drag and drop, notifications, tray icon and global shortcuts.
items.title: Victiniiiii/SushiReminder: Very lightweight reminder app using React + Tauri, with drag and drop, notifications, tray icon and global shortcuts.

items.content_html: A lightweight and extensible templating engine for rendering dynamic content with support for variables, loops, conditionals, and nested structures.
items.title: alhassanalbadri/templating-engine: A lightweight and extensible templating engine for rendering dynamic content with support for variables, loops, conditionals, and nested structures.

items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js application that routes incoming HTTP requests to a designated backend, effectively masking the target service's IP address.
items.title: brkcoc02/reverse-proxy: A lightweight Node.js application that routes incoming HTTP requests to a designated backend, effectively masking the target service's IP address.

items.content_html: A lightweight TypeScript library that provides a set of commonly used React hooks to enhance your components with powerful functionality. Mainly created for my personal use.

items.content_html: FeatherKit is a lightweight, modern, and versatile component library powered by Tailwind CSS. It offers developers beautifully designed, reusable components that integrate seamlessly across various frameworks, making UI development a breeze.
items.title: KygoSkyrus/FeatherKit: FeatherKit is a lightweight, modern, and versatile component library powered by Tailwind CSS. It offers developers beautifully designed, reusable components that integrate seamlessly across various frameworks, making UI development a breeze.

items.content_html: IronCloak is a lightweight password manager focused on simplicity and security. It encrypts your credentials and stores them securely in a MongoDB database. Built for reliability without unnecessary features, IronCloak ensures your passwords are safe and accessible only to you.
items.title: rohitghosh1763/IronCloak-MongoDB-: IronCloak is a lightweight password manager focused on simplicity and security. It encrypts your credentials and stores them securely in a MongoDB database. Built for reliability without unnecessary features, IronCloak ensures your passwords are safe and accessible only to you.

items.title: FxOmar/GhostCursor: A lightweight library for real-time collaborative cursors, enabling seamless cursor synchronization and interaction across multiple users in shared environments.
